Functions.Name: clr
Functions.Description: Sets the current text color to the color specified by the given color index.

Parameters.Name: colorIndex
Parameters.Description: The index of the color to set the current text color to.

Functions.Name: w
Functions.Description: Wait for player input.

Functions.Name: auto
Functions.Description: Automatically advance the text after the specified amount of time

Parameters.Name: waitTime
Parameters.Description: How long to wait before advancing automatically (30 is 1 second)

Functions.Name: vAuto
Functions.Description: Lets the game auto advance when the currently playing voice line finishes

Parameters.Name: waitTime
Parameters.Description: How long before the dialogue is automatically advanced (30 is 1 second). -1 waits until the voiceline ends

Functions.Name: hideSpeaker
Functions.Description: Hides the name of the speaker displayed at the top of the dialogue box for the current line and waits for player input. If you want to hide it for the rest of the message you can instead set speaker to nothing using [speaker][n]

Functions.Name: speaker
Functions.Description: Changes the name of the person speaking so there can be multiple speakers in a single message. Use at the start of a new dialogue like so:[s][speaker]New Speaker Name[n](Then continue as normal)

Functions.Name: vAuto2
Functions.Description: Lets the game auto advance when the currently playing voice line finishes (seemingly exactly the same as vAuto except this one is used instead for the dungeon messages, like party members being nearly dead)

Parameters.Name: waitTime
Parameters.Description: How long before the dialogue is automatically advanced (30 is 1 second). -1 waits until the voiceline ends

Functions.Name: s
Functions.Description: Indicates the start of a line

Functions.Name: var
Functions.Description: Loads name previously defined by SET_MSG_VAR

Parameters.Name: VariableID
Parameters.Description: The ID of the variable set by SET_MSG_VAR function.

Functions.Name: itemVar
Functions.Description: Displays an item that was set using SET_MSG_VAR(varId, itemId, 1)

Parameters.Name: colorIndex
Parameters.Description: The index of the color to set the item text to. Only has an effect if itemIconId isn't -1

Parameters.Name: itemIconId
Parameters.Description: The id of the icon that is displayed next to the item name, use -1 for the actual icon of the item. Using anything other than -1 also messes up the displayed name (so always use -1).

Parameters.Name: VariableId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the variable set by SET_MSG_VAR function.

Functions.Name: flag
Functions.Description: Turns a specified flag on or off, use at the end of a selection option. Does nothing if used in a message

Parameters.Description: Always 0, setting to other value stops the flag from being changed although it's possible something else is being changed instead
Always 0, setting to other value stops the flag from being changed although it's possible something else is being changed instead

Parameters.Name: flagId
Parameters.Description: The id of the flag to set

Parameters.Name: state
Parameters.Description: The state to set the flag to (1 or 0, on or off)

Functions.Name: vp
Functions.Description: Plays a voice sound cue from a specified sound bank.

Parameters.Name: eventIdMajor
Parameters.Description: Major id of the event.

Parameters.Name: eventIdMinor
Parameters.Description: Minor id of the event.

Parameters.Name: eventIdSub
Parameters.Description: Sub id of the event.

Parameters.Name: cueId
Parameters.Description: The id of the sound que in the sound bank.

Functions.Name: lName
Functions.Description: The player's last name

Functions.Name: fName
Functions.Description: The player's first name

Functions.Name: item
Functions.Description: Displays the name of an item including the respective item icon and specified colour

Parameters.Name: colorIndex
Parameters.Description: The colour that the item text and icon is

Parameters.Name: itemId
Parameters.Description: The id of the item to be displayed

Functions.Name: giveitem
Functions.Description: Gives the player a specified item

Parameters.Name: itemId
Parameters.Description: The id of the item to give to the player

Parameters.Name: itemAmount
Parameters.Description: The amount of items to give to the player

Functions.Name: bup
Functions.Description: Sets the bustup to display.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The id of the character.

Parameters.Name: expressionId
Parameters.Description: The id of the character's expression.

Parameters.Name: costumeId
Parameters.Description: The id of the character's costume.

Parameters.Name: position
Parameters.Description: The character's position on screen (1 is right, 2 middle, 3 left). Using three bustup at once doesn't work although having one on each side does (having one in the center and one on either side causes the center one to slide to the unoccupied side)

Functions.Name: remBup
Functions.Description: Removes the currently displayed bustup

Parameters.Name: bustupPosition
Parameters.Description: Which bustup to remove based on the position defined in [bup]. 0 hides all bustups

Functions.Name: exp
Functions.Description: Plays an expression over a character

Parameters.Name: modelId
Parameters.Description: The id of the model to play the expression over

Parameters.Name: expressionId
Parameters.Description: The id of the expression to play (these are defined in the common enums.json)

Functions.Name: anim
Functions.Description: Makes a character play an animation (parameters need research)

Functions.Name: slAffinityInvis
Functions.Description: Adds affinity to the specified social link, increasing how close the player is to ranking up with them. Unlike the slAffinity function, this does not spawn the notes expression but still plays the sound effect

Parameters.Name: socialLinkId
Parameters.Description: The id of the social link that will recieve the affinity. If 0 this is based off of the id set in EVT_FUNCTION_0009(0, slId) in a flowscript

Parameters.Name: increaseAmount
Parameters.Description: How many affinity points to give to the social link (the amount of points given is not 1:1 to the entered value).

Functions.Name: slAffinity
Functions.Description: Gives an sl points, playing the correct notes expression and sound effect over the specified model

Parameters.Name: socialLinkId
Parameters.Description: The id of the social link that will recieve the affinity. If 0 this is based off of the id set in EVT_FUNCTION_0009(0, slId) in a flowscript

Parameters.Name: increaseAmount
Parameters.Description: How many affinity points to give to the social link

Parameters.Name: modelId
Parameters.Description: The id of the model to play the expression over
